Class LimitedController

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.robolib.module.controller.LimitedController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PIDSink, SpeedSink, SpeedSource, SpeedController, MotorSafety

    public final class LimitedController
extends java.lang.Object
implements SpeedController, MotorSafety
    A SpeedController limited by Boolean Sources.

    Austin Reuland
